channel.title: Speechful: a Speechless reaction podcast
channel.itunes:summary:
This is an episode by episode review of the ABC show Speechless, starring Minnie Driver and Micah Fowler. We’re talking a little bit about the episode, and we’re also using it as a jumping off point to talk about a range of related issues.

Why should you listen to us? Joe's got an interesting viewpoint. He was an awkward nerdy child who had a brother who used a voice system very similar to JJ’s. In fact, he grew up as Ray.
Quite a lot of this podcast will consist of Joe either applauding or complaining about the situations that come up and how much they resonate with someone who grew up in a similar situation.
channel.itunes:author: Speechful: a Speechless reaction podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: We watch the ABC show Speechless and talk about it.

item.title: S01E05 – H-A-L– HALLOWEEN

item.title: S01E03 – B-O-N–BONFIRE
item.description: Today we are talking about Speechless S01E02: B-O-N–BONFIRE During which we spend a lot of time talking about the fact that Joe is going to be a father and complaining about people who run. Unhelpfully we recorded this a while ago so Joe now has a nine month old baby and has joined a running club… […]
item.content:encoded:
Today we are talking about Speechless S01E02:  B-O-N–BONFIRE 

During which we spend a lot of time talking about the fact that Joe is going to be a father and complaining about people who run.  Unhelpfully we recorded this a while ago so Joe now has a nine month old baby and has joined a running club…

We also talk about Disneyland a lot.

item.title: S01E02 – N-E-NEW A-I-AIDE
item.description: Today we are talking about Speechless S01E02: N-E-NEW A-I-AIDE. We talk about cheerleading, the fact that stealing is wrong, and where the link between aide, friend, and ‘responsible parent’ is.
item.content:encoded:
Today we are talking about Speechless S01E02: N-E-NEW A-I-AIDE. 

We talk about cheerleading, the fact that stealing is wrong, and where the link between aide, friend, and ‘responsible parent’ is.
